altername_name: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 2 - The Price of Desire
name: The Legend of Dark Witch 2
overview: The Legend of Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist. Created by indie games company INSIDE SYSTEM in 2014, The Legend of Dark Witch 2 is a 2D action story sequel to "The Legend of Dark Witch". True to its predecessor, Legend of the Dark Witch 2 retains its simple controls and enough challenges to satisfy the completist. Players have 8 stages to choose from and must use SHOTs to make their way through a variety of obstacles to reach the boss enemy. Within each stage there are hidden "Pura Syega" which are helpful to power up player characters.
